title: Please ID India / Arabic / Sanskrit style font
content:
I’ve used this years ago and now can’t find the name of this font.  
Please help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090820043900im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5687.gif)
author: julzmon

comments.content: I found what the font was it’s called Exotica by [http://www.yoyo-rarandays.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090820043900/http:/www.yoyo-rarandays.net/ "http://www.yoyo-rarandays.net/")
